      • resourceCreated

        public void resourceCreated(RequestDetails theRequest,
                            IBaseResource theResource)
        Handles incoming resources. If the resource is a rest-hook subscription, it adds it to the rest-hook subscription list. Otherwise it checks to see if the resource matches any rest-hook subscriptions.
        Specified by:
        resourceCreated in interface IServerOperationInterceptor

      • resourceDeleted

        public void resourceDeleted(RequestDetails theRequest,
                            IBaseResource theResource)
        Check subscriptions to see if there is a matching subscription when there is a delete
        Specified by:
        resourceDeleted in interface IServerOperationInterceptor
        Parameters:
        theRequest - A bean containing details about the request that is about to be processed, including details such as the resource type and logical ID (if any) and other FHIR-specific aspects of the request which have been pulled out of the servlet request.
        theRequest - The incoming request
        theResource - The response. Note that interceptors may choose to provide a response (i.e. by calling ServletResponse.getWriter()) but in that case it is important to return false to indicate that the server itself should not also provide a response.

      • resourceUpdated

        public void resourceUpdated(RequestDetails theRequest,
                            IBaseResource theResource)
        Checks for updates to subscriptions or if an update to a resource matches a rest-hook subscription
        Specified by:
        resourceUpdated in interface IServerOperationInterceptor
